column98:
comment:"Spinner is fine as far as working is concerned

Suggestions to Dawlance company:

1: Power cable length to be little bit more
2: Use commonly used power plugs which are suitable to available power sockets. This particular plug with this spinner does not fit with majority of the sockets.
3: The advertising stickers of detergents pasted on the spinner needs to be of better quality. These are of poor paper with very stronger glue which leaves smudges of paper on spinner
column99: looking very ugly. It must be other way round with good quality paper and mild glue to be removed easily. The sticker of Guarantee is fine as it's easily removable. other stickers to be of same quality.\n It seems a punishment for a buyer to see ugly stickers of detergent companies on their equipments. You take money from them
column100: which is fine but still it's customer's right if he wants to keep or remove these. "}
